thread.title: Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield Made Spideypool Happen at Golden Globes; Internet Reacts Appropriately
thread.title_full: Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield Made Spideypool Happen at Golden Globes; Internet Reacts Appropriately

author: Dan Van Winkle
title: Ryan Reynolds and Andrew Garfield Made Spideypool Happen at Golden Globes; Internet Reacts Appropriately
text:
by Dan Van Winkle | 1:56 pm, January 9th, 2017 
Ryan Reynolds made the Deadpool movie happen apparently by sheer force of will, so forgive us for hanging on his words about Deadpool getting a boyfriend as though the mere suggestion will cause it to become reality. Here he is, already attempting to once again bend the cosmos to his bidding by making out with one-time Spider-Man Andrew Garfield at the Golden Globes. 
Take a look and just try to tell us Reynolds doesn’t know exactly what he’s doing in reference to the pairing of he and Garfield’s fictional heroes: OH MY GOD RYAN REYNOLDS AND ANDREW GARFIELD KISSING IN THE BACKGROUND LMFAOOO IM BLAKE LIVELY SITTING THERE CLAPPING pic.twitter.com/DLAfYfaRGq 
So uh … safe to say we’re getting a Spideypool movie at some point, even if it takes Reynolds a decade or more? OK, maybe not (disappointing), but fans across the Internet are definitely happy about the nod.  stexvebucky: Spideypool is canon https://t.co/pseAsuA0aE 
— Kiashii Talmadge (@kiashii) January 9, 2017 @VancityReynolds YOU ARE THE BEST, I LOVE U. #SPIDEYPOOL pic.twitter.com/pqn6Qd9nBC 
— Diann Vega♡ (@diannv94) January 9, 2017 Face à spideypool j’suis pic.twitter.com/JJRu7Suke6
